alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:56AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln, Lawrence and western Jefferson Davis Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1155 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bogue Chitto, or 10 miles south of Brookhaven, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Enterprise around 1205 PM CDT. Brookhaven around 1210 PM CDT. East Lincoln around 1215 PM CDT. Sontag around 1230 PM CDT. Wanilla around 1235 PM CDT. Oma around 1240 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Hebron and Silver Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for south central Mississippi.
